channel.title: facebook on Sebastian Korotkiewicz - Tech{{log}}
channel.description: Recent content in facebook on Sebastian Korotkiewicz - Tech{{log}}

item.title: Facebook watches our messages from messenger.
item.description: How to get a 72h ban in a second after sending a message. By sending this exact photo to someone, we get a 72h ban (automatically?).

item.title: Mark Zuckerberg says 'Facebook has 2 billion people!'
item.description: Mark Zuckerberg officially announced that over 2 billion people in the world have a Facebook account As of this morning, the Facebook community is now officially 2 billion people! We’re making progress connecting the world, and now let’s bring the world closer together. It’s an honor to be on this journey with you.

item.title: Facebook on Tor
item.description: Zuckerberg jealous that I have a blog with my name in the domain, decided to open his factory in onions. Facebook available at: https://facebookcorewwwi.onion/
